text: WBLY-LP (101.5 FM) is a Christian radio station licensed to serve the community of Sycamore, Georgia. The station is owned by Bethel Baptist Church of Sycamore, Georgia, Inc. It airs a Southern Gospel/religious format. The station was assigned the WBLY-LP call letters by the Federal Communications Commission on June 12, 2003. ==References== ==External links== * Official Website * BLY-LP BLY-LP Category:Radio stations established in 2005 Category:2005 establishments in Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Southern Gospel radio stations in the United States Category:Religious radio stations in the United States Category:Turner County, Georgia BLY-LP
title: WBLY-LP
